Here everyday. Thank you, leader SCoups. Your mere existence is already a blessing to millions of Couprangs. Thank you for making every day worth living. You are such an inspiration to keep going especially when times are hard. Pls be happy & well everyday of your life.

text: Dearest Seungcheol, please keep laughing and smiling and finding happiness in the little things. Never stop singing, dancing and expressing yourself in whatever way feels right to you. author: @lillllllssssssy1904
text:
dear Choi Seungcheol, S.Coups, uri leader

To all the hardships that you've been through. I just want to say Thank you, thank you for going through all the ups and downs up until now. Please know that there are so many people here and out there who support and love you. Even though I haven't met you yet and vice versa, please know that I, along with all Carats, will always be there for you and all the seventeen members. 

You are strong cheol, super strong. I'm so proud of you. Always know that you are as precious as diamond in our heart.
❤💎

author: @zvxnon
text:
누구보다 빛나고있는 승철아 내가 살면서 제일 잘했다고 생각했던건 세븐틴을 좋아하게됀일이야 난 아이돌에 관심도 없어서 노래도 잘 아는게 없었는데 널 알게됀이후로 세상이 빛나는거같아 너로 인해서 내가 많이 바뀌었어 너를 볼때면 과분할정도로 행복해져 내 감정들이 너랑 관련됀일들에 더 쏟아지는거같아 내가 제일 신나는 일은 너를 내 주위사람들에게 소개하는일이고 제일 행복한순간들은 너를 보는날이였어 아직도 너의 미소가 잊혀지지않아 힘들때면 쉬어도돼 캐럿들은 무슨일이있어도 승철이편이여서 캐럿들은 다 이해해줄거야 가끔은 사람들에게 기대보기도 했으면 좋겠어 어린나이부터 이길을 걷기가 쉽지않을텐데 아이돌해줘서 고맙다는말이 너무 해주고싶었어 너가 무대를 설때면 밝은별이 유독 더 빛나는것같고 너가 다리를 다쳤을땐 내가 대신 아팠으면 하는 맘이였어
내가 주는 사랑이 너가 받는사랑중에 제일 적었으면 좋겠다 넌 사랑을 평생 받아도 모자라는 별이니까

author: @bbcarat
text:
Baby Carat here, barely a month old! The first time I heard this song, I thought to myself, I’ve never heard such strong emotions expressed in a song before — in every line sung, the emotions felt so palpable. 

S,coups, I hope whatever it is that troubled you when you wrote this has already been left in the past. And if there are any more worries left in your heart now, know that you are never alone. So many people love you and care about you. Continue shining! We have your back, always 💎

author: @scoupsii
text: “승철, **‘Me’**가 제게 얼마나 큰 의미인지 표현할 방법이 없습니다. 처음 이 노래를 들었을 때부터, 당신의 목소리와 가사는 제게 계속해서 위로가 되어왔어요. 당신의 목소리는 마치 모든 것이 괜찮을 거라고 느끼게 해주는 안전하고 이해받는 감정을 주는 것 같아요. 당신이 담아낸 감정이 매 순간 깊이 울리고, 당신의 가사에 담긴 고뇌와 성장, 힘이 제 마음을 말로 표현할 수 없이 깊이 다가옵니다. 당신의 생각을 이렇게 개인적이면서도 보편적인 가사로 풀어내는 능력을 항상 존경해왔어요. 당신의 글쓰기는 정말 특별하고, 사람의 마음에 직접 닿는 방식이 있어요. 그 점은 절대 변하지 않기를 바랍니다. 제발, 계속 글을 써주세요. 세상은 당신의 목소리와 가사, 그리고 우리가 혼자가 아니라는 느낌을 받을 수 있는 당신의 말을 필요로 해요. 새 음악을 작업 중이라고 들었어요. 그 소식에 너무 기대가 돼요. 앞으로 당신이 만들어낼 모든 음악도 지금까지 해온 것처럼 아름답고 의미 있을 거라고 믿어요. 제게 필요한 위로가 되어주어서 고맙고, 가장 힘든 날에도 세상의 아름다움을 볼 수 있게 해준 곡들에 정말 감사해요.”

author: @scoupsii
text: seungcheol there are no words that can fully express how much ‘Me’ means to me. From the moment I first heard it, your voice and the lyrics have been a constant source of comfort. Your voice has a way of making me feel safe and understood, like everything will be okay no matter what. The emotions you pour into every note resonate so deeply, and the way your words reflect your struggles, growth, and strength touches my heart in ways I can’t describe. I’ve always admired your ability to put your thoughts into lyrics that feel so personal yet universal. Your writing is truly special you have a way of speaking directly to the soul, and it’s something I hope never changes. Please, never stop writing. The world needs your voice, your words, and the way you make us feel like we’re not alone. I’ve heard you’re working on new music, and I can’t wait to hear it. Whatever you create next, I know it will be just as beautiful and meaningful as everything you’ve shared so far. Thank you for being the comfort I didn’t know I needed, and for writing songs that help me see the beauty in everything, even on the hardest days

text:
クプスの魂がこもった歌が公開されてもう1年経ったんだね。
歌詞を知った今、クプスがいつの時代のクプスを思い浮かべて書いた歌詞がわからないけど、その頃のクプスをただ抱きしめて愛で包み込みたいと思うよ。
生きているだけでいいってよくいうけど、生きるってすごく難しいことだよね。小さなことから大きなことまで1日のうちに何度も選択があって、選択を悔やんで…毎日その繰り返し。どうしようもない状態で誰かに言う勇気もなくて自分自身がどうでもよくて人生を辞めてしまいたくなることも沢山あるけど、SEVENTEENに出会えたからここまで生きてきて良かったと思える。
エスクプスが、スンチョルが、今日という日まで生きてきて良かったと心の底から思える日が来ますように。
時に負担になるかもしれないけど、時には救いになると思うからこの言葉をかけます。
沢山の人がエスクプスという人を、スンチョルという人を愛しています。
あなたの人生が誰かの人生の柱になっています。
今日まで生きてきてくれてありがとう。
生まれてきてくれてありがとう。
SEVENTEENになることを選んでくれてありがとう。
caratとSEVENTEENのリーダーでいてくれてありがとう
心から愛しています。

author: @태연-o4t
text: 쿱스야 너에게 항상 너무 고마워.내가 지치고힘들때도,행복할 때도 언제나 내 옆에 있어줘서 고마워.나에겐 어쩌다보니 가족보다도 더 위로받고,기댔던것같아.엄마가 공부 안한다고 연예인이 밥 먹여주냐고 뭐라하고 날 한심하게 봐.근데 아니.나에겐 그것보다 훨씬 더 소중해.밥 먹여주는 연예인보다 그저 옆에서 지켜봐주고 응원해주고 믿어주고 토닥여주는 너희가 생각 이상으로 소중해.나에게 너흰 날 일으켜주고 행복을 주는 없어선 안될 소중한 사람들이야.가족만큼이나.항상 캐럿들,세븐틴 챙기느라 고생이 많다 쿱스야.항상 고맙고 해주는게 없어 미안해. 언제나 캐럿들이 있어. 기대고싶을 땐 언제든 기대.사랑해 잘자~쿱랑해~❤️

author: @kidult2107
text:
난 (Me) Lyrics with english trans 

:)

[Verse 1]
어젯밤 꿈속에서 다른 나를 꿈꿨어
지금 거울 앞에 나 말고 다른 날
도망치고 싶은 맘 그게 참 쉬웠나봐
어쩌면 벼랑 끝에서 다른 날 찾아

Last night, I dreamed of a different me
Now, in the mirror, it's not me, but another me
The desire to escape, it's seems so easy
Maybe at the cliff edge, looking for another me

[Pre-Chorus]
매일 현관문을 밀고 나설 때
다른 사람이 된 기분을 느껴
내 안과 밖에 다른 두 개의 세상이
손가락질 해 겁쟁이라 욕 해

Every day, when I push open the front door
I feel like becoming a different person
Inside and outside, two separate worlds
Pointing fingers, calling mr a coward, cursing me

[Chorus]
두 개의 이름의 나는
두 개의 삶을 살어
내 어떤 삶을 사랑하나요
두 개가 나인 나는
마음이 하나라서
당신에게 난 하날거예요

I am someone with two names
Living two different worlds
Which of these lives do I love?
As the two (names) are in me
Because My heart is one
I will be one for you

[Post-Chorus]
난 (난), 난 (난)
난, ooh, 난
두 개가 나인 나는
마음이 하나라서
당신에게 난 하날거예요
난

Me (me) me (me)
Me, ooh me
As the two (names) are in me
Because My heart is one
I will be one for you
Me

[Verse 2]
비린내 나는 그 입 좀 닥쳐봐
그게 내 몸에 밴지도 몰라
쉽게 뱉은 말은 모두 거짓말, 그렇게 거짓말
그게 사실이 돼
그럴 때 난
아무 말도 못했어
아무 것도 못했어
그래서 난

Shout your fishy mouth
I dont even know if its on my body
Easily spoken words, they're all lies
Such lies soon become the truth
At moment like those
I couldn't say or do anything
That's why, I

[Pre-Chorus]
다시 현관문을 밀고 나설 때
다른 사람이 된 기분을 느껴
내 안과 밖에 다른 두 개의 세상이

Again, when I push open the front door

Pointing fingers, calling mr a coward, cursing me

두 개의 이름의 나는

내 어떤 삶을 사랑하나요

I am someone with two names
Living two different lives
Which of these lives do I love?
As the two (names) are in me
Because My heart is one
I will be one for you

난, ooh, 난
죽고 싶었던 나의
손목을 놓지 않은

Me (me) me (me)
Me ooh me
To you 
who didn't let go of my hands
when I want to die T.T

author: @MeShine8989
text:
I still remember this day a yr back when CHEOL surprised us by dropping ME. He not only kept his promise but allowed us to see his vulnerable state he went through the whole process. It was the day when we all cried together.
The day we cheered for both S.COUPS & CHOI SEUNGCHEOL.

Happy 1 year our precious ♡

author: @user_factory13
text: 2024년 나의 첫 곡은 이 곡이였어. 행복과 사랑을 노래하는 밝은 곡들도 정말 너무 좋아하지만 힘든 시간을 스스로 이겨내고 너의 이야기가 담긴, 너의 이야기인 이 노래로 팬들에게 선물을 안겨주는 너가 너무 자랑스럽고 멋있어서도 있지만 우리 쿱스, 우리 승철이에 그런 모습을 나도 본받고 싶었어. 덕분에 2024년 처음에는 처음이라서 너무 어렵고 힘들고 도망치고 싶었지만 이제 2025년을 얼마 남겨두지 않는 지금 나의 2024년은 정말 평화로워. 우리 쿱스야, 승철아 우리의 가수가 돼줘서, 우리에 행복이 돼줘서, 삶의 의미가 돼줘서 정말정말 고마워. 다가오는 2025년 아프지말고 우리 웃으면서 또 서로를 사랑하며 성장해나가자. 많이많이 정말 사랑하고 고맙다.

author: @vboldoy
text:
Letra en español

Anoche soñé con un yo diferente
Ahora, en el espejo, no soy yo, sino otro yo
El deseo de escapar, parece tan fácil
Quizás, al borde del acantilado, buscando otro yo

[Pre-Estribillo]
Cada día, cuando abro la puerta de entrada
Siento que me convierto en una persona diferente
Por dentro y por fuera, dos mundos separados
Señalando con el dedo, llamándome cobarde, maldiciéndome

[Estribillo]
Soy alguien con dos nombres
Viviendo dos vidas diferentes
¿Qué vida amas? Como los dos en mí son uno
Mi corazón es uno
Seré uno para ti

[Post-Estribillo]
Yo, yo
Yo, ooh, yo
Como los dos en mí son uno
Mi corazón es uno
Seré uno para ti
Yo

[Verso 2]
Cierra tu boca de pescado
Ni siquiera sé si está en mi cuerpo
Palabras fáciles de decir, todas mentiras, esas mentiras
Se convierten en la verdad
En momentos como esos, yo
No podía decir nada
No podía hacer nada
Por eso, yo

[Pre-Estribillo]
De nuevo, al empujar la puerta principal para abrirla
Siento que me convierto en una persona diferente
Por dentro y por fuera, dos mundos separados
Señalando con el dedo, llamándome cobarde, maldiciéndome

[Estribillo]
Soy alguien con dos nombres
Viviendo dos vidas diferentes
¿Qué vida amas?
Como los dos en mí son uno
Mi corazón es uno
Seré uno para ti

[Post-Estribillo]
Yo, yo
Yo, ooh, yo
Como los dos en mí son uno
El yo que quería morir
Aferrándose a mis muñecas
Seré uno para ti
Yo

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning!
these days there are more videos of scoups being hurt on stage because of his injury. while i understand that it's something that will continue to happen and that he just wants to perform for carats and be on stage with the members... i still feel very upset whenever i see him in pain. knowing that he's a grown up man and can make right decisions for his health, i still worry a lot. it's natural to worry about people you like. it's even more natural when the list of people you like is very limited. i've heard that wonwoo and the8 had health problems as well recently? i really hope the members get to rest now that one part of the tour is over. knowing how hard they work to achieve their dreams, to make carats happy... i don't want to lose this moment, so we need to be careful and patient, so we can be together and see each other for a long time

author: @yingtaobeojji
text: good morning! it's 11:11, i wish for seventeen members' health and happiness

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! it was hard to fall asleep last night, i kept thinking about seungkwan's post, everything people's been talking about yesterday. i'm not good at words. if i knew that a member could read this, i would've tried harder. but as someone who comes here and shares words amongst other carats... i think i get get away with mumbling? we've all had a time like this, when you just want to say something out loud

it's so painful to think that not much can be done to help? at moments like this, it feels like you want to become a shield for those you love, you want to curse everyone who's been cruel and unfair to the members. as situations progress, all most of us can do is check news updates and hope for the best. and that, in the end, the members don't get hurt even more. they've never let me down, but it feels like i'm letting them down by not being able to protect them.

i selfishly worry about the group status as well. whenever something happens, i always worry, because i cannot imagine life without seventeen and their music. after so many years, i'm worried, and i don't want to say goodbye. but, when i think about it, it's health and peace, that's what i want for the members. and that's the only thing that should matter to me as a fan. because of how much happiness and strength the members have given us, they deserve to have freedom to be able to live the happiest versions of their lives.

and it goes to other artists and fans as well. although i won't ever understand the hardships artists go through,  as a fan, i wish the world was kinder to artists. i wish their fans were also nicer to them. 

i'm happy that seventeen members have each other to rely on and trust. i hope the team's bond is never broken, no matter what. as long as they have each other, it's going to be okay, right?

author: @yingtaobeojji
text: good morning! i don't know what to focus my mind on, the new video and woozi's post seem like the most important things. i actually cried as i was reading woozi's message. as someone who matured and grew with seventeen's music, i cherish and love every song deeply. we'll probably never understand for sure what goes behind each of them, how much care and work is put into them. i'm grateful we have woozi, grateful for the members. i hope we get to hear their songs for a long time. but i'm also worried because of overwork. i hope the members get some time to rest and don't push themselves too hard, because carats will love and support them no matter what

私が辛いときいつも支えてくれるのはSEVENTEENで、クプスの言葉に歌声に存在に何度助けられたか分からない
今も辛いけどSEVENTEENのおかげでクプスのおかげで生きていけるよ

쿱스야 내가 정말 힘들때 죽을만큼 힘들고 우울한데 아무도 안알아보는거 같을때 나에게 다가와주고 날 잡아준 존재가 너였어 그리고 너도 힘들때 쉬어도 되고 모든걸 다 짊어지고 가려하지 않아도 돼 난 너를 보고 목소리를 들으면서 정말 많은것을 얻었는데 캐럿으로서 너에게 해줄수 있는게 많이 없어서 너무 미안해 세븐틴을 좋아하게 되면서 행복이란걸 알게되엏고 내 삶의 질이 급상승하는 기분을 느꼈어 정말 고맙고 또 사랑해 세븐틴이 되어줘서 내 곁에 와줘서 너무 고마워 너의 삶 하루 하루가 행복하고 행운이 믾고 힘든일 없이 좋은 하루가 되었으면 좋겠어 진심으로 사랑하고 고맙고 또 미안해😊😭

author: @salyalm
text: I came back here to listen to your voice after hearing the voice of bullying from colleagues at work and from my family and harassment badly from men. I feel frustrated, but you encourage me in some way. I thank you very much, but I am crying now over what happened. We are still at the beginning of the week, so I am afraid.

author: @salyalm
text: I feel safe with you. I feel like you are saying, “You can do this, you can succeed in your life.” But after I imagine that you are a person who does not know that I exist, other than that my family does not support me and they think that I am just a young woman who does not understand anything, but you encourage me in some way.

author: @salyalm
text: I feel unsure of myself. I feel like I'm lost sometimes. My family tells me not to become obsessed with men, especially you, but I found security and love in you. How can I not become obsessed? You helped me in many aspects of my life, so I thank you. I saw your performance today and I felt proud. I felt proud. That I can become something as great as you

author: @yingtaobeojji
text: good morning! i had lots of meetings today, so i came here late... i'm glad i didn't miss any lives today, i'm watching DK's live now, and watched Jun's live during my work meeting. there are so many lives these days... the concept photos we got look nice, i'm so happy about the comeback. but i cried a lot when Jeonghan was live yesterday. come to think of it, it's been so long, i cannot imagine a long time without the members. i even saw Jeonghan in my dream today. i think i've never seen seventeen members in my dreams? maybe i just don't remember. it's upsetting as a fan, because it's my only chance to see the members - in my dreams. even today, i only dreamed of seeing his photo online haha but the photo had short black hair, that was interesting to see

author: @SVT-xm1yw5wt2c
text:
승철아, 쿱스야, 두 개의 이름과 삶을 가진 너는 너무나도 사랑스러워서 항상 날 살려. 그리고 내 마음에 하나로 안착했어. 
내가 어떤 모습으로 있든 나에게 사랑스럽다고 해주는 너라서 나도 너의 모든 면이 사랑스러워. 
그래서 내가 지금을 살아가. 그러니까 너도 할 수 있어. 아니, 벌써 잘했어. 최고야. 이렇게 말만 해줘 우리가 알 수 있게만 해줘 그럼 달려갈게. 정말로.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning!? i woke up to the jeonghan military announcement... because we all expected it, it doesn't make me very sad. all the videos and photos from yesterday of our precious 13 members, i'm too in love to be upset.

when i think about it, i've waited for seventeen debut for quite long. so waiting for the end of military service is not a problem, i'm used to waiting. when you're waiting for something or someone, you get to look through happy memories, you get excited, and you feel twice as happy once the time to meet comes.

as long as everyone is healthy and safe, it's okay to continue living and feeling happy. and, one day, seventeen become 13 again.

author: @Zhzjkznsn
text:
이 노래들과 가사들로 너가 어떤 삶과 인생을 살아왔을지 알것 같아
가사 하나하나가 쿱스와 승철이가 느꼈을 감정이고 한번 쯤 했을 생각이라는게 처음 세븐틴의 맏형으로써 12명의 동생을 이끄는 리더로써 몰래 어떤 생각들을 했는지 알것같은 노래중 하나인것 같아 그냥 이 노래를 들으면서 하고싶은 말은 
그저 수고 많았고 잘했다고 말해주고 싶다 많은 케이팝리더들 중에 자랑스러운 리더가 되어줘서 고맙고 또 고마워 
너가 캐럿들과 그 많은 캐럿들중에 하나인 나에게 알려주고 도와주고 베풀었던거 모두 부족하지않게 캐럿들의 사랑으로 또 다시 계속 보답할게 넌 그저 우리가 보답해주는 사랑 받아주면 돼 받아주는것만으로도 우리는 충분하다 느껴 항상 캐럿들 위해,멤버들 위해 먼저 나서줘서 너무너무 고마워 사랑한다 쿱스야

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
i always come here in the mornings, but after the latest announcement i feel so sad, i decided to come here again. it's been months, so this song is my biggest safe space. being a fan is difficult, sometimes your happiness depends on the idols you've chosen and their well-being. to me, if jeonghan's military service goes well, if he's healthy, that's all that matters. actor jun is something we've all loved and praised, so i hope for success and i wish jun good luck. 
i guess many carats are going to be sad they won't see 13 members on stage during tour, but, as i've never been to a concert and i never will, i don't think i'm allowed to feel upset about the tour. in the end, it's still seventeen, same songs, same vibes.
i've waited for debut for so long, i think i can wait for the 13 members reunion for a long time. no matter what, i know that i will wait, since seventeen are the most important artists to me. as long as everyone is healthy and well, it's going to be alright. a year later, five or ten years later, it doesn't matter 

phew writing all this and listening to this song helps a lot. free therapy, everyone! thanks to our leader for this song

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! i got a cat yesterday, it's a black fluffy kitten with a white spot on it's neck. i didn't plan on getting a kitten, i've always wanted to have a dog. but i don't think i'm financially stable enough, neither do i have enough time for dog training. i'll keep my dream of owning a dog for my future.
i looked for pets that were up for adoption, i did it because i couldnt fall asleep, and i simply fell in love with this kitten. i've thought of it for a while, and finally brought it home yesterday. it was so hard to contact the shelter, but i was super annoying and got a reply after all.
i cannot think of a name yet. it has to be something related to seventeen, but i don't think it's a good idea to name a cat after a member, is it? i'm so lost. i thought that it could be anything, even a kind of food/dish. but it would be more meaningful if i could capture my love for seventeen, it could be a reminder for many years. if i  cannot find any ideas, i think i'll just go with 'cherry', but it's a hard decision to make...

author: @avialea2261
text: Coups, you said you'll have another surgery and you'll rest again. Thank you for informing us ahead of time. Take the time you need. Your health comes first. We're witj you and eagerly wait for you. Come back healthy. Be happy.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! yesterday was such a lucky day for me, such a happy one. i couldn't wake up early because i worked a lot before that, so i was worried i missed seungcheol's birthday live. i was so glad that it didn't, it started soon after i'd woken up. the set up looked so pretty, everything was pretty. 
it made me a little sad that seungcheol is going to take a break next year, but i think health is more important than anything. if we want to be together for a long time, seventeen and carats, we need to take good care of our health. in my carat time, i've already waited for members. it's not easy, when you're a fan, but it's rewarding when they come back in better physical and mental health. seeing people you love smile happily is very rewarding, knowing that your idols are taking good care of themselves is something to be thankful for.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning, happy s.coups day! happy birthday to our leader, the coolest of them all! 
i couldn't wake up early because of working yesterday, so i was worried i'm going to miss a birthday live. looks like it didn't happen yet, i feel so lucky!?
i hope our leader is just as lucky every day of his life. 
the more time passes, the harder it is to write birthday messages. it was easier before, i could write long posts expressing my love. perhaps the older you get the more difficult it is to show love with words? 
but i'll always look for ways to show love to our leader, no matter how old we get

Happy Birthday coupsieee ❤
Wishing you a great year ahead.Thank you for being born.Your confidence inspires me to be more confident in myself.
Just know that carats are here for you and always support you no matter what you choose to do.
And Thank you for coming into my life 🥹. I love you with all my heart ❤️.Thanks for being strong all this time. If I could give you one gift, It would be the ability to see yourself through my eyes. author: @anisahsuhailah1596
text:
스쿠프스, 일단 목소리가 너무 좋은데 오늘은 목소리에 대해 이야기하고 싶지 않아요.
꿈을 위해 필사적으로 달려온 최승철과 이야기를 나누고 싶다. 이제 서른이 됐는데, 더 이기적으로 살고, 더 이기적으로 살아주길 바라요 최승철. 자급자족하고, 효율적으로 열심히 일할 수 있고, 어디를 가든 인정받는 그룹을 만들기 위해 열심히 노력하셨습니다. 승철님, 형으로서, 리더로서, 아들로서, 수백만 명이 존경하는 남자로서 정말 대단합니다. 당신은 이렇게 훌륭하고 재능 있는 그룹을 이끌었고, 이제 당신이 당신 곁에서 걱정 없이 하루하루를, 당신이 좋아하는 일을 하고, 경력을 시작한 이후 꿈꿔왔던 일들을 이루며 하루하루를 충실하게 살아갈 수 있기를 바랍니다. .
당신이 가진 재능을 의심하지 말고, 당신이 사랑하는 것을 공유하고 항상 기억하십시오. 당신의 두 측면인 최승철과 스쿠프는 항상 캐럿들에게 소중합니다. 사랑해요 스쿱스, 최승철님 사랑해요. 이기적으로 행복하게 살아주세요. 이제 걱정 없이 달려가세요. 저희가 여러분의 모든 발걸음을 응원하겠습니다. 저는 여기 있는 수천 명의 팬일지 모르지만, 이 댓글란에서는 아이돌뿐만 아니라 당신이 제 눈을 사로잡은 이후로 계속 우러러보고 아껴온 한 남자를 아끼고 사랑하는 사람입니다.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning!
these days i see many sad posts from new carats, many of them are upset they didn't meet seventeen earlier. it's got even worse once caratland ended. i cannot share their feelings well, as i've been with seventeen from the very beginning, but i can understand them a little. it's hard to find the right words to cheer up these people? after all, when i think about it, being with seventeen for 12 years or for 1 month... none of this is enough, as seventeen are so good. and no matter what's waiting for us in the end, i'm going to be just as sad as the others.
come to think of it, i won't be interested in kpop unless seventeen exists. i don't think i truly realise their impact on me, i don't think i am able to comprehend the amount of love i've got for the members. this love is something that cannot be measured and cannot be explained with words of any language

text: good morning! i had to check weverse before coming here, and i saw some posts regarding the plane situation. i genuinely feel sorry for those carats that travelled long distance to meet the members, but i feel so relieved that seventeen are safe. after years of ups and downs, after everything that has happened so far, their safety is what i worry a lot about. knowing that the members are fine and safe, that's what makes me feel better. that's all i care about. it's a scary situation, right? i hope everyone is doing fine and isn't too stressed

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! i woke up so early today because of work... but it just means that i'm going to have a longer day, so that's good!
carat land day 2 was even better?! didn't think it was possible after day 1, but seventeen are doing the impossible. i'm so grateful

world tour announcement was a bit expected, so i wasn't shocked. well, maybe that's because i cannot attend concerts. because of that, i don't get shocked about such news. i left my dreams of seeing seventeen perform live, i left these dreams behind many years ago. but i feel genuinely happy for others, whenever i see other carats' posts. every time someone says 'i hope they come to ___' i agree and hope for the same thing. if my dream cannot come true, many others should have an opportunity to fulfil theirs

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! i'm so happy i got to watch carat land yesterday! and i cannot wait for day 2. even if it's an online stream, it's very exciting and emotional. i cannot think of a part i liked most because each performance and game was such high quality and fun. the units changing performances, the unfitting songs for each member, the old music which seventeen performed, the 'call call call' performance.... all of that and more, it all made me so happy. come to think of it, seventeen are always making us happy and proud, seventeen never disappoint and always do their best. 
the whole 'youth with seventeen' hits hard home, considering i've been with them since i was about 15. thank you for making my youth brighter, and i hope that we, as fans, are making seventeen youth better with our love.
can't wait for day 2 to start! 

p.s. scoups looked so handsome yesterday, but everyone is waiting for 'smart' dance cover hehehe

good morning, good afternoon, good evening!
tomorrow is carat land and i'm so excited! even though my dreams and chances to attend carat land are slowly disappearing each year, i'm still thinking of it as one of the most exciting and precious times in a year. what does it feel like, what does it feel like to be there? i wonder. 
i've never missed official streams like that, but it's going to be hard to watch it this year because i work on both days. if i try hard, i will be able to watch some parts, and then watch everything as the recordings. this year is going to be a special year, so i'm looking forward to it

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! tomorrow is my friend's wedding, so i'm a little stressed today. well, everyone is stressed. the weather is super hot, there are many things that still need to be done. one more thing i think about... i wonder if i ever get married, and if she ever gets to attend my wedding as well. come to think of it, i've been a kpop fan most of my life. i've been a seventeen fan for almost half of my life. it's going to sound weird and crazy if i say it out loud but... could it be the reason why i cannot find love? when i think about it, i always wonder if i ever meet someone similar to my first love. when i think about it, scoups was my first love back when i was 15. now that i'm older, i still worry that my expectations and standards are too high because of him. people say falling in love with an idol is crazy, but it was difficult to avoid such thing when i was a teenager.
on the good side, i'm forever grateful that our leader has never let me down. i'm thankful that the idols i've chosen to love are good people, i'm proud to call myself a carat

author: @yingtaobeojji
text: good morning! the Glastonbury effect is still going strong, a couple of my friends are now considering becoming carats after watching the performance. it feels like the end of 2022/ the whole 2023 all over again, that's the time when many of my kpop friends asked for help navigating in seventeen content, links, music, the members. i loved helping baby carats dive into caratland, and i'm so happy i get to experience something similar again. introducing seventeen world, but also introducing my world, because, after so many years, our worlds are pretty much 'one' now. sharing something you love is always nice, but it's especially nice to know that these people will now share their own love with seventeen

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning 🩷🩵 Glastonbury festival! i missed a few performances yesterday, so i had to watch it all again after work. i feel so proud! i keep saying this, but that's only because it's true. when you really like someone, you feel proud of every step they take. it was so nice to see so many people of different kinds singing along to seventeen songs. it was so nice to hear such meaningful songs being performed for the crowd. i saw lots of people complimenting the members, their vocals, dancing, looks, their hype. i hope there will be many new carats in our fandom.

 seventeen made history yesterday, let's achieve many more things together!
i loved seeing our leader do some choreo. i loved seeing scoups and jeonghan dancing. my favourite part was seeing all 13 members perform. because life's difficult and unpredictable sometimes, it's important to cherish every moment together. to show love and support while you can. to be there for those you chose as your safe space 🩷🩵

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! seventeen at glastonbury festival ah it's today! i'm so excited! i'm going to watch it online, that's what i'm hoping for. the way i think of it, it's a chance for seventeen to gain more fans. it's a chance for our fandom to grow, for many new carats to join caratland. and that's wonderful. when i think of it, i want more and more people to become fans and start enjoying seventeen music.
i hope performing at this festival goes super well, everyone has fun, stays safe and has the time of their lives. and that the weather is good!
every day is a celebration of achievements and success when you're a carat. i won't ever stop feeling proud

author: @ValerieAbby
text: This song really elicits a lot of emotions from me. S.Coups didn't even do any promotions or teasers for this. He just wanted to bare his feelings to Carats. This was an emotional and tumultuous time for him, so he decided to channel his raw emotions into a song and share it to us. I hope more people get to listen to this because it's such a great song that was executed so well. This song deserves more recognition.

author: @Dailycoups
text:
승철아
나는 너가 억지로 눈을 뜬 피곤한 아침도 이상하리만큼 상쾌했으면 좋겠고, 
너를 괴롭히는 것들은 천천히 부는 바람에 날려 작별할수 있으면 좋겠어. 
다른 사람들이 너에게 하는 말들은 다 네 마음에 꽃을 심는 것처럼 예쁜 말뿐이었으면 좋겠고 
먹고 싶은 것들은 다 먹었으면 좋겠어. 잠들때는 뒤척이지 않고 단잠에 푹 빠졌음 좋겠고
너를 골치아프게 하는것들은 알아서 비켜갔으면 좋겠어.
고요한 새벽이 활기찬 아침이 언제나 너에게 선물이면 좋겠어. 
이제 미래를 생각할 땐 불안이 아닌 여유로움이 가득 차 있었으면 좋겠어. 
혹여 힘든 일이 생겨도 널 굳건하고 단단한 사람으로 만들어 줄 정도로만, 
네가 거뜬히 이겨낼 정도로만 너에게 찾아오면 좋겠어. 
너의 곁에는 별다른 이유 없이 따듯함이 가득했으면 좋겠어. 
그렇게 너의 삶이 고요하고 평화롭게, 때로는 뜨겁게 흘러갔으면 좋겠어. 


승철아 너는 한번도 나에게 자랑스럽지 않은 적이 없었고 
나의 행복이었고 자부심이었어.
내 아티스트가 되어줘서 고마워.
앞으로 너가가는 길을 언제나 응원할게.
나의 자리에서 언제나 묵묵히 응원할게.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! I've just realised that i forget everything i want to say by the time morning comes...?
i wake up later than usual, i need extra sleep since i watch football at night. the games are... they're okay?
i liked the story by jeonghan and wonwoo, the one that came out yesterday. the whole concept is so creative. and i just like listening to them talk, their voices are so beautiful 

i hope everyone's taking good care of their health, i like that we're currently in a good place as a fandom/group. let's keep it this way for a long time! times like this are so precious

author: @sfugqre
text:
오늘 꿈꿨는데 승철아 네가 죽더라. 나 순간 일어나고 멍했어. 진짜 죽은줄 알고. 꿈속에서 네 자의로 죽진않고 사고로 죽었지만 너무 생생해서 현실인줄 알았어.
그렇게 멍하니 있는데 너가 올려준 연습실 거울셀카가 생각나더라. 그제서야 그게 꿈인걸 알았어. 그리고 살아있어서 다행이라고 안도했어.
근데 꿈은 현실과 반대라 하잖아. 앞으로 너도 나도 잘될건가봐. 승철아 앞으로 힘든일 없이 쭉쭉 올라가자.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! and happy moon junhui day ❤ i think it's one of the loudest days for me, i'm always very loud and excited whenever i talk about our jun. he's so precious 

weverse translations... but it seems like our leader's health is now better! and that's wonderful, i'm very happy. being open and honest during our ups and downs is the reason behind the strong connection between seventeen and carats. i appreciate it, but it does make me sad whenever any of the members are going through hard times. if you ask me, i'd take half the pain to myself. no one likes it when people they love are suffering

author: @thuydb123
text:
I have struggled with anxiety and depression since I was in 8th grade, and now I am 25 years old. I can feel everything that was written in the lyrics. So thank you, Scoups. You don't know how much you have inspired this world. I really don't feel lonely anymore. But instead, I feel like someone understands me and what I have gone through. You and SEVENTEEN have inspired us and saved many of us from our darkest time in life. We would love to be your support as always at any time possible <3 You deserve all the love in this world, Scoups. More than "Thank you," I wish I can find even prettier words to express our gratitude and love to you. 
pjnb3ar, you've done well. 8:50AM, 10 of June, 2024.

text: good afternoon! i woke up late today, i went to bed at 5am yesterday. i was trying to catch up with some work, and then i wanted to watch going seventeen. i have a 24 hour rule for content. if i don't watch a new release in 24 hours, it means i'll never watch it because i will probably forget. or there will be too much new content and i won't have time. this rule has helped me a lot to stay a carat and have time for seventeen no matter what - back when i was at school, then university, and now at work.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! today's truly a good morning because it's seventeen's anniversary, it's the happiest of all mornings, isn't it?
because i remember the journey towards debut, it's even more precious to count years and celebrate success. 

i got a debut date tattoo this year, so i am now even more attached to this day than ever. let's all be healthy! health comes first. carats will always support and help to make dreams come true. let's just be healthy and stay together for a long time 🩷🩵

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! last night, as i was reading posts and articles online, i felt like crying. for some reason, whenever good things and success come our way, something bad always follows. i don't know if it's all just a coincidence, but that's how it feels. and i've been a carat since trainee days.

i wish there was a way to show love and support seventeen directly, without any third parties :) i never know who to believe, i find it hard to trust people. but, in the end, the members are the only ones i believe and i can trust. 

as long as seventeen and carats are together, it's going to be fine, right? this comeback is so precious, i want to stay in this happy moment for a little longer. 13 members together on stage, the anniversary is around the corner, the members are finally performing at Nissan Stadium!? i want to keep this as a happy memory, even if happiness often comes with a bit of bitterness. 
because i feel so proud of my favourite artists, i wish to forget about what i cannot change, and enjoy the moment in the next two days. we'll work this out later, i'm sure of it. 🩷🩵

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good afternoon 😅 i've just woken up, i went to bed late because i was doing embroidering and watching movies. work starts late today, so it's okay.
i've watched some videos from the recent concerts, i got sad once again, i always get a little sad because i cannot attend concerts. but i'm always happy in the end. even if i cannot go, i'll always be happy as long as seventeen can do concerts. i hope seventeen have many many wonderful concerts in the future. 
ah, there was also a single album announcement. it wasn't shocking because we've been prepared for a jeonghan and wonwoo duo. i'm always excited for new music, especially from seventeen members

author: @maryh_chl
text: 이 노래를 주신지 꽤 시간이 지났지만, 그래도 감사하다는 말을 전하고 싶습니다. 우리를 향한 여러분의 헌신과 기부에 감사드립니다. 저희를 이렇게 사랑해주셔서 정말 감사드립니다. 개인적으로 나는 그에게 더 많은 빚을 지고 있으며, 가장 진실한 미소와 가장 행복한 웃음을 빚지고 있습니다. 당신이 내 삶에 들어왔을 때 당신이 행복을 되찾았기 때문에 나는 당신에게 모든 행복을 빚지고 있습니다. 힘들어도 포기하지 않고 응원해주셔서 감사합니다. 나는 당신에게 가장 행복한 삶, 최고의 미소, 항상 당신 곁에 있을 수 있는 사람들을 기원합니다. 내가 울어야 할 때 당신은 항상 내 곁에 있을 거라는 걸 알아요. 그리고 어느 날 주변에 아무도 없다고 생각되더라도 우리는 항상 당신 곁에 있을 것입니다. 최선을 다하는 여러분을 늘 응원하겠습니다. 정말 고마워요. 사랑해요, 우리 철.

good evening! i wanted to comment in the morning, i had a lot on my mind, but i was too sleepy to make my words make sense... and then the day took over and i got too busy with daily activities and work.
what i want to say is that i love this song a lot and i cannot imagine going a day without it. how come it's so good? it must be because i love choi seungcheol a lot. every time i come here, it's like talking to a good friend of mine. it feels like i'm getting reassurance that everything's gonna be okay.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! well, good afternoon 
i worked a lot last night, so i woke up late today. Maestro promotions are over and i feel a little sad... whenever seventeen members work hard, i always wish for them to rest more. but i also try to enjoy every performance because nothing lasts forever. now that it's over, i feel both excited and sad? i think i've seen all performances, i try to watch all performance videos- all fancams of every member, choreography versions, facecams. i've seen the performance so many times, but i'm not tired of the song! that's how you know the song is very good

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! it's my birthday today, so i'm starting my day well and listening to my favourite song. i will work all day, so there won't be much fun happening.
i wonder if there will be any posts or lives from the members? those that happen on my birthday always have a special place in my heart. even though i cannot watch anything during the day, i wonder if there will be anything at all? 
i'm 27 now and it feels surreal. i was like 15 when i found seungcheol and pledis trainees. time is so fast....

Hello Seungcheol 
I want to tell you that you did a very wonderful job and the song was kind of sad and full of emotions even though I am not Korean most of the words I did not understand but do you know that feeling like a heart connection, I cried a lot because I remembered myself when I was going through a hard time The song and your wonderful voice were the best and from this I want you When you feel the same feeling or worse, Share this with the carat, so that we may relieve you of the pain, even a little, and this talk is generally addressed to everyone (members and carats), so let's stay healthy and not hate ourselves.  ❤️😭❤️❤️‍🩹🍒🍒

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! well, afternoon. i slept for so long because i went to bed late, i was watching movies and embroidering. 

i caught up with all comeback videos now! i think i've heard maestro thousands of times. i have this song in my playlists, but i also watch all performances and all 13 fancams... sometimes there's also a face cam... 😮
but it's a good thing the song is so good, i can listen to it all day long

i wonder what kind of a hairstyle seungcheol will get now? because i saw a weverse post of him choosing between black and blue? i think everyone looks more handsome with natural hair, so i'm a big fan of black colour. but... when you bleach and damage your hair for red... i think it's better to try all colours, since it's already bleached? seungcheol looked so cool with blue hair before, i think he'll look even better now because he's more mature? 🥰

author: @Kim_Wooahae
text:
[Verse 1]
Last night, I dreamed of a different me
The other one than the one standing in front of the mirror
The desire to run away, I guess that was easy
Perhaps I'll find the other me at the edge of the cliff

[Pre-Chorus]
When I push through the front door everyday
I feel like becoming a different person
The two different worlds inside and outside of me
Pointing fingers, cursing, and calling me a coward

[Chorus]
Me, with two namеs
Live two lives
Which one do you lovе?
Despite the two of me
I have one heart
So to you, I am one

[Post-Chorus]
Me (Me), me (Me)
Me, ooh, me
Despite the two of me
I have one heart
So to you, I am one
Me

[Verse 2]
Shut that fishy mouth
I don't even know if that stuck to my body
All the words said easily were lies, and all those lies
Become the truth
At times like that
Couldn't say anything
Couldn't do anything
So I

[Pre-Chorus]
When I push through the front door again
I feel like becoming a different person
The two different worlds inside and outside of me
Pointing fingers, cursing, and calling me a coward

[Chorus]
Me, with two names
Live two lives
Which one do you love?
Despite the two of me
I have one heart
So to you, I am one

[Post-Chorus]
Me (Me), me (Me)
Me, ooh, me
You didn't let go of my wrist
When I wanted to die
So to you, I am one
Me

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning! it's comeback day! that's so exciting!? is it just me or everything is happening super fast this time? feels like it's just been announced...
i'm a little upset that i have a lot of work to do today, i won't be able to enjoy any of the content till late at night... but that's okay, i'll catch up. since i have been managing carat life in high school and university, it's almost as easy to keep going with it whilst juggling jobs. after all, seventeen are the reason why i smile the most, there's always time for those you love.
it'll be a shame if i miss any lives, but i'm sure other carats will enjoy them on my behalf.

author: @dillasalsabillas.r3486
text:
[에스쿱스 "난" 가사]

[Verse 1]
어젯밤 꿈속에서 다른 나를 꿈꿨어
지금 거울 앞에 나 말고 다른 날
도망치고 싶은 맘 그게 참 쉬웠나봐
어쩌면 벼랑 끝에서 다른 날 찾아

[Pre-Chorus]
매일 현관문을 밀고 나설 때
다른 사람이 된 기분을 느껴
내 안과 밖에 다른 두 개의 세상이
손가락질 해 겁쟁이라 욕 해

[Chorus]
두 개의 이름의 나는
두 개의 삶을 살아
내 어떤 삶을 사랑하나요
두 개가 나인 나는
마음이 하나라서
당신에게 난 하날 거예요

[Post-Chorus]
난 (난), 난 (난)
난, ooh, 난
두 개가 나인 나는
마음이 하나라서
당신에게 난 하날 거예요
난

[Verse 2]
비린내 나는 그 입 좀 닥쳐봐
그게 내 몸에 밴지도 몰라
쉽게 뱉은 말은 모두 거짓말, 그렇게 거짓말
그게 사실이 돼
그럴 때 난
아무 말도 못했어
아무 것도 못했어
그래서 난

[Pre-Chorus]
다시 현관문을 밀고 나설 때
다른 사람이 된 기분을 느껴
내 안과 밖에 다른 두 개의 세상이
손가락질 해 겁쟁이라 욕 해

[Chorus]
두 개의 이름의 나는
두 개의 삶을 살아
내 어떤 삶을 사랑하나요
두 개가 나인 나는
마음이 하나라서
당신에게 난 하날 거예요

[Post-Chorus]
난 (난), 난 (난)
난, ooh, 난
죽고 싶었던 나의
손목을 놓지 않은
당신에게 난 하날 거예요
난

author: @yingtaobeojji
text: good morning! i went to a concert yesterday. it was a concert of a local singer who started his career in 2000. i've been his fan for over 20 years, and i was so happy to finally see him live after so long. it made me think that i shouldn't give up on seeing seventeen live. sometimes i think that... i've been a fan for many years, but i've never had a chance to go to a seventeen concert. before debut, i was so sure i would always attend every concert, i was so determined. now that i think about it, i hope to go to a concert in the future. i now think it is more possible. and, the more time passes, the more exciting the concert feels. that's how i feel

good morning! yesterday's comeback teaser was so cool, i cannot wait! 
oh, and i got two seventeen tattoos yesterday, that's exciting. never thought i'd be a person who gets tattoos, but it feels natural and nice when they're seventeen related. jun's cat looks super cute! and i hope the flower that seungcheol dew brings a lot of luck to me. even if it doesn't, it still looks beautiful. after all, i already am very lucky. i'm lucky i'm a carat, i'm lucky to be a seventeen fan for so long.

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning to my favourite song! so many things are happening, so many things to catch up with. i've read interviews, watched trailers, saw photos. i haven't seen the newest episode of going seventeen yet! but i'll do that today. each seventeen comeback i think to myself... this cannot get any better? but they keep surpsing...

today's a big day because i'm getting new tattoos! my first one was dedicated to seventeen, and i wanted to keep going, so i'll be getting one tattoo for each member. today, i'm getting a flower which Seungcheol once drew, it looks super pretty, and it will remind me of him. i'm also getting one of the cats our Jun has drawn. even though i like dogs more, Jun is always so excited about those cats. i want something like that to keep as a memory.

author: @nirmic1149

Cheol, we love you so so much.

Even so, it doesn't make your pain unjustified.
You deserve all the best things the world has to offer, but vile people make such a realization hard to keep a hold on.

Remember to take strength in thosewhot hold respect n care for you. *Relying on love is what SEVENTEEN has taught me ♡*

author: @HoShi-m3z
text:
今までも沢山SEVENTEEN、そしてクプスに救われたよ。
2023年は本当に私にとってすごく辛くて、生きることを諦めてしまいそうなぐらい辛かった。
けれど、やっぱり手を差し伸べてくれたのはクプスでありSEVENTEENだったんだよ。私の心を救えるのはクプスしかいなくて、私は貴方のために生きるしか意味が見つけられなかった。私は貴方たちみたいに居場所も仲間も愛も無ければ、それを得るための努力もできない。けれど、そんな私でもこの世界で生きたい、生きなければいけないと思えたのは
エスクプスとSEVENTEENのおかげでした。こんな私に生きる意味と生きる希望をくれてありがとう。
本当に辛い時は、私たちの目の前から姿を消してでも、信頼する仲間と愛する人たちと幸せでいてください。
あなたたちの幸せが私の幸せです。
いつも愛をありがとう。歌手になってくれてありがとう。愛してます。

author: @yingtaobeojji
text:
good morning to my favourite song! yesterday was such a good day, all because of the concert. i worked, but i checked the live stream a few times. unfortunately, i missed most of it, but i was still happy. i'm just happy to know our seventeen are performing together again. i will watch more fan videos and look at photos after work today. ah i have to work all day today, i think i will catch up with everything on Monday. i have a lot of free time on Monday.
as much as seeing 13 members together, i am just happy to see Seungcheol back on stage. even if he cannot take part in every performance, his presence makes everything better. we should be grateful for the new hair colour, too. because it's so bright, it was easy to follow our leader and see if he's performing or not. since we haven't seen him in so long, it was very useful.

i keep thinking if i can ever attend a concert like that, i think about how the clock is ticking. length doesn't matter much, but i've been a carat for so many years. if i never have a chance, that would be devastating.

and i watched our leader's vlog from Sapporo as well. it made me miss the snow. all the snow in my hometown is currently melting, so it was nice to go back in past for a little. looking at the museum was nice as well, but the best part was our s.coups, of course 🤭

text:
가성 진짜 예쁘다.. 노래가 좀 마음에 와닿게? 가사를 마음에 잘 전달하는? 뭔가 되게 진심이 잘 전해지는 좋은 목소리로 깨끗하게 부르는 느낌

좋은점이.. 전주가 산뜻한 멜로디라 좋고, 목소리는 저음인데 기교나 습관이 없고 담백해서 좀 무거울 수 있는 가사가 산뜻하게 들려요
가성부분이 여리고 시원한 느낌이라 예쁘고, 다 좋은데 나아아우워~ 이렇게(;;) 올리는 부분이 질리지 않고 넘 듣기 좋습니당
다음에 음원도 나오면 좋겠네요

author: @elviavroragemini
text: I'm writing in English because I'm afraid the translator in Korean will say "bye" to my meaning) I'm here after the news about the army. I'm sure that your friends, family and fans support you and stay by your side, I'm not worried about it. But I worry that you would be by yourself and become a strong support for yourself, because this is very important. I'm sure you'll get better over time, you'll run and jump around having fun with other guys. I really hope so. It's okay to fall, right? Everyone is falling. But the main thing is to get up after the fall and take small steps further. And people, especially haters, they talked, they talk and they will talk. It started as soon as the human species appeared on earth. Usually, when a person is happy, they don't want to hurt another person. We can only feel sorry for them. So, let's just look ahead, pay less attention to dirty tricks, pay more attention to the good around you. Be healthy and happy.💎

author: @Minae.Y
text: スンチョル〜🍒✨、私の友人が、【北海道のスンチョルの写真】❄️⛄❄️を見て…おもわず、インスタ〜の、フォロワーになったって!！😍✨　今日、この曲を、おすすめしたら、きいてくれたよ❗👍✌️👌　日本語訳も、きいてくれて…すごく共感（きょうかん）してた！！🌟🥺😥😣←彼女は、先月、急に、からだが、動かなくなって、仕事（しごと）に、行けなくなって、辞めさせられたんだ？！🔥😫　だから、とても、今、つらいんだ？！😭　２０１１年の、東北大震災でも、仕事の重圧（じゅうあつ）😫＆ストレス😰で、うつ病😵になって…保険（ほけん）の仕事を、うしない、１年半くらいか、働けなかった？！😣😫😭　そういう　経験（けいけん）が、スンチョルを、一目見て、共感（きょうかん）したんだね！！　今日は、私の⭐Birthday⭐だけど、その子だけ、２０年位？！、御祝（おいわい）🥳してくれるんだ❗　やさしい人は、やさしい人が、わかるんだね！！☺️💕✨　〜〜今日も、お疲れ様！🍀✨　くたくた　だろうから……私の元気、"おすそわけ"してあげるね❗🎀✨🚩　🍀✊🍀👍🍀✌️🍀💪🍀🍓🍀🍋🍀🍎🍀✨🌷✨💐✨💖🤍💚🌈✨✨✨✨✨　3/4.吉🌟

author: @_pracky_
text:
사랑하는 승철아, 일단은 내 메시지나 어떤 메시지도 읽지 않았으면 좋겠다.
세상은 불안으로 가득 찬 사람들이 사는 무서운 곳입니다. 그러나 그러한 불안감에 따라 행동하고 다른 사람을 무너뜨리려고 하는 사람들은 회복할 수 없을 만큼 피해를 입습니다. 하지만 그래도 좋은 일들만 보셨으면 좋겠습니다.

당신이 밝게 빛날 때, 당신의 빛은 다른 사람들이 자신의 최고의 잠재력에 부응하지 못하고 있다는 사실을 일깨울 것입니다. 그것은 일부 사람들이 인정하고 싶어하지 않는다는 고통스러운 알림입니다. 당신을 싫어하는 사람들은 (타당한 이유 없이) 당신이 한 일이나 하지 못한 일 때문에 당신을 싫어하는 것이 아니라, 당신이 그들에게 그들 자신의 내면에서 직면할 준비가 되어 있지 않은 것을 상기시키기 때문에 당신을 싫어할 것입니다. 게다가, 자신의 고통이나 목적을 인식하지 못하는 사람은 자신의 좌절감과 부족함을 다른 사람에게 투사하는 경우가 많습니다.
비가 와도, 햇빛이 와도 캐럿들은 언제나 여러분 곁에 있을 것입니다. 우리 세봉이들이 지어준 이름에 걸맞게 살아갈게요 - "더 빛나게 해주는 캐럿들" ❤

author: @_pracky_
text:
Dear Seungcheol, for once I hope you dont read my message or any message in fact.
The world is a scary place with people full of insecurities. But those who act on those insecurities and try to bring down other people are damaged beyond repair. But i still hope you only see good things. 
When you shine bright, your light will awaken others to the fact that they're not living up to their highest potential, it's a painful reminder that some don't want to acknowledge. Those who dislike you (without valid reason), will very often dislike you not because of anything that you have done or failed to do, but because you remind them of something that they're not ready to face within themselves. Only someone who is not aware of their own pain or purpose will project their frustrations and inadequacies onto everyone else. 
Carats will always stand by your side, in rain and in sunshine. We will live upto our name that our sebongies have given us -  "Carats who make them shine brighter" ❤

author: @sedra6
text:
I met Scoops four years ago, and everything has become to me. I am jealous of him, I love him, and I cry when I see his opinions. I hope you read my comment and know how much I love you, love your voice, and love everything about you. You are everything to me, I hope you always stay well Also, I hope to meet you in the future. I love you very much. 

나는 4년 전에 Scoops를 만났고 모든 것이 나에게 이루어졌습니다. 나는 그 사람을 질투하고, 사랑하며, 그 사람의 의견을 보면 눈물이 난다. 내 댓글을 읽고 내가 얼마나 당신을 사랑하고, 당신의 목소리를 사랑하고, 당신에 관한 모든 것을 사랑하는지 알기를 바랍니다. 당신은 나에게 전부입니다. 항상 잘 지내길 바랍니다. 그리고 앞으로도 만나기를 바랍니다. 난 아주 많이 당신을 사랑합니다  ❤

author: @opdexx
text:
⚠️⚠️ *Carats please protect Scoups* . He's getting hate for not getting enlisted in the military. Don't ever try to involve other groups in any situation and bring them down, don't be offensive, don't abuse others. *SPREAD A LOT OF LOVE AND POSITIVITY TOWARDS SCOUPS AND SEVENTEEN* .The Support should outshine all the hate. Spread this message to fellow carats. We can do this.⚠️⚠️
Scoups is categorised under grade 5 due to his Acl surgery and is considered to be unfit to serve in military according to korean laws but should serve when there's a war breakout. The injury is still new and was on hiatus past year.‼️  *Spread this all other social media platforms too* ‼️

author: @opdexx
text:
⚠️Carats please protect Scoups. He's getting hate for not getting enlisted in the military. Don't ever try to involve other groups in any situation and bring them down, don't abuse others. *Spread more love and positivity towards Scoups and Seventeen*.The Support should outshine all the hate. Spread this message to fellow carats. We can do this.⚠️
Scoups is categorised under grade 5 due to his Acl surgery and is considered to be unfit to serve in military according to korean laws but should serve when there's a war breakout. The injury is still new and was on hiatus past year.

author: @lilacrma
text: scoups, I hope you're doing well. we saw the news. It's not your fault that you got hurt.  until now, you have kept us updated on your rehabilitation, but never expressed the pain and hardships. it must be painful. acl injury has a long recovery and your life will be different but your progress has been amazing. i hope your rehab continues to go smoothly without much pain. we are here by your side at every step you take. we trust you and you don't owe anyone an explanation bc the government decided for you. medical professionals and officials decided and they know more than anyone else so ignore those ignorant people who know nothing about your condition and the law. you should be proud of yourself in everything you have done. you are the strongest person ever scoups. please take it easy and we can't wait to see you at the encore concert.
